creator: hchan@datawave.ca
text:
We need a way to construct an HTTP request from a former HTTP response using 
regex
i.e. a response may send you a dynamic variable such as an "AccountID"
Your next HTTP request will be based on this AccountID

creator: kcassell@360Commerce.com
text:
The regex functionality requested has been present for some time.  See the 
regex function.
